title: When AIs bargain, a less advanced agent could cost you
content: The race to build ever larger AI models is slowing down. The industry’s focus is shifting toward agents—systems that can act autonomously, make decisions, and negotiate on users’ behalf. But what would happen if both a customer and a seller were using an AI agent? A recent study put agent-to-agent negotiations to the test and…
author: Caiwei Chen
